sentences.sContent: It is all the same God, and that God showed me that the universe in which we live is a beautiful and marvelous mystery that is connected together forever and for always.
sentences.sContent_eng: It is all the same God, and that God showed me that the universe in which we live is a beautiful and marvelous mystery that is connected together forever and for always.
sentences.sCn: 他们所谈的是同一个上帝，这位上帝向我展示了我们生活在其中的这个宇宙的美丽和奇妙的神秘，它们关联在一起，永永远远。

synos.tran: 了不起的；非凡的；令人惊异的；不平常的

remMethod.val: “马虎了事”→马虎做事就不会有惊人的成就→令人惊奇的

words.tran: 奇迹般地；不可思议地；令人惊讶地
